channel.title: Server crashes
channel.description: Hey guys my server crashes all the time in my server file after a few hours or so it says that everyone is already online and then no one can get in unless i restart the server? so can someone help me fix it ill attach a picture to give futher help i also use fr33sc4p3 pkz. thank u

item.title: Server crashes
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

That truly is an odd error. Have you modified the server from the base? If so, try the base server to see if it experiences the same cashes. That would be a sign that it’s probably your client. If that doesn’t help, I’m fairly clueless.

Read full topic
